orders...\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、やるだけやってみましょうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, let's just try doing whatever we pain."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、その痛みも次第に薄れていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, that pain gradually faded returned to how we were!\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わー、良かったですー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, that's great!\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさんに、シィルさん？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance-san and Sylph-san?"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えーと……私達、一体……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Umm... what exactly are we...?\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, right..."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あのわけの分からない奴……","translatedEnglishLine":"That incomprehensible guy..."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確か、バスワルドってのになって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He apparently became something called Baswold...\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow..."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と迷惑かけちゃったみたいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems normal."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝して敬えよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be thankful and show respect.\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha...\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、結局バスワルドってなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, after all, what exactly is Baswold?\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ごめん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Sorry."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達にも分からない」","translatedEnglishLine":"We don't understand it either.\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、なんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But somehow..."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達ってそうなるみたいね」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems that's what happens to okay.\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここのところいつも抱えていた、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lately, the certainty we always held,"},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつかきっと元に戻る……","translatedEnglishLine":"that someday we’d surely return to normal..."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　という確信が消えました」","translatedEnglishLine":"has disappeared.\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少し……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A little..."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　胸にぽっかりと穴が開いたよう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it feels as if there's a hollow hole in my truly feels like having lost half of oneself...\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh..."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも悪いことばかりじゃないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But it's not all bad.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だって……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because...\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"アムがハウゼルの手を取り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Am took Hauseru’s hand,"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイゼルの手と繋がせた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and linked it with Saizel’s hand."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一人では手を繋ぐことは出来ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"One cannot hold hands alone.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ね？　だから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right? So...\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方達は、二人のままでいいのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s fine for you two to remain as two.\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そう、ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that’s right...\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mm..."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、まあ、いっか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I guess it’s fine...\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人のままで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Remaining as two...\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、その前に、なんなの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, before that, what is it?\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Things that the person themselves can't do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の命令でも難しいけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are difficult even with my orders..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、やるだけやってみましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, let's just try doing whatever we can."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初に感じたのは――苦痛。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first thing I felt was—pain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つのものが二つに別たれる
しかし、その痛みも次第に薄れていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, that pain gradually faded away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰もがそうであるように。
あのわけの分からない奴……
確か、バスワルドってのになって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He apparently became something called Baswold..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と迷惑かけちゃったみたいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like we caused a lot of trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、俺様が元に戻してやったのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, I was the one who put you back to normal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、結局バスワルドってなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, after all, what exactly is Baswold?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達ってそうなるみたいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems that's what happens to us."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃあいつかまたあんな風に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then someday, it might happen again like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、それは大丈夫かと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I think that will be okay."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここのところいつも抱えていた、
いつかきっと元に戻る……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that someday we’d surely return to normal...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という確信が消えました」
胸にぽっかりと穴が開いたよう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it feels as if there's a hollow hole in my chest..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそ、半身を失ったよう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It truly feels like having lost half of oneself..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも悪いことばかりじゃないわ」
アムがハウゼルの手を取り、
サイゼルの手と繋がせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and linked it with Saizel’s hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一人では手を繋ぐことは出来ない」
「貴方達は、二人のままでいいのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It’s fine for you two to remain as two."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、やるだけやってみましょうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, let's just try doing whatever we can."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, that pain gradually faded away.

あのわけの分からない奴……
確か、バスワルドってのになって……」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、結局バスワルドってなんだ？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達ってそうなるみたいね」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それじゃあいつかまたあんな風に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then someday, it might happen again like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、それは大丈夫かと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I think that will be okay."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that someday we’d surely return to normal...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it feels as if there's a hollow hole in my chest..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それこそ、半身を失ったよう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It truly feels like having lost half of oneself..."
